settings.title: Forward Challenge: Your Summer Fitness Adventure!

settings.html:
Imagine a summer where you're not just dreaming of a fitter body, but actually living it. What if you could achieve this transformation with just a few simple steps, all from the convenience of your home?
Many of us start fitness journeys with high hopes, only to be derailed by busy schedules, lack of proper guidance, and the challenge of staying motivated. Without a clear path and supportive community, it's easy to fall off track.
Now, say hello to the Forward Challenge! This exciting 6-week event is designed to help you stay active and get noticeable results with just a small investment. Plus, you have the chance to win a full refund reward! With our adjustable dumbbells and the support of a vibrant community, you’ll be on your way to achieving your fitness goals in no time.

settings.title: Challenge Overview
settings.content:
• Goal: Work out 3 times a week, each session lasting at least 30 minutes.
  • Duration: 6 weeks
  • Workout Requirement: Each workout should include strength training with our adjustable dumbbells.

Who Can Participate?

  • New customers purchasing our adjustable dumbbells. (Use code Forward10 for a 10% discount on adjustable dumbbells as a Forward Challenge participant.)
  • Customers who purchased Ativafit dumbbells after March 1st.

settings.title: Who Can Participate?
settings.content:
• New customers purchasing our DT1166 dumbbells. (Use code Forward10 for a 10% discount on DT1166 as a Forward Challenge participant.)
  • Customers who purchased Ativafit dumbbells after March 1st.

settings.title: Instagram Engagement:
settings.content:
• Follow us on Instagram.
  • Comment on our challenge post with your fitness goal and tag two exercise pals to join the fun!

settings.title: Join Our Community:
settings.content:
• Become a member of our exclusive Facebook group.
  • Share your workout sessions, get guidance, and stay motivated with peer support.

settings.title: Check-In & Rewards:
settings.content:
• Workout 3 times a week, with each session above 30 minutes.
  • Check-in for at least 20 workout sessions over the 8 weeks to get a 20% refund. Post a photo or video in the Facebook group each time.
  • The top 5 participants who share the most workouts will receive a full refund!

settings.title: Account Verification:
settings.content: • Submit your Facebook/Instagram account and the email you used to place your order to verify your participation.

settings.title: Instagram Engagement:
settings.content:
Follow us on Instagram.
Comment on our challenge post with your fitness goal and tag two exercise pals to join the fun!

settings.title: Join Our Community:
settings.content:
Become a member of our exclusive Facebook group.
Get guidance, share your workout sessions, and stay motivated with peer support.

settings.title: Participation Verification:
settings.content: Provide your Instagram and Facebook handles and the email you used to place your order for verification before 2024/7/8. This ensures we can track your participation and reward you accurately.

settings.title: Join Our Exclusive Fitness Facebook Group
settings.content:
• Step 1: Commit to 3 weekly workouts, share your progress, and earn exclusive rewards
  • Step 2：Unlock Rewards: Stay active in the group, participate in challenges, and unlock exciting rewards!

settings.title: Check-In & Rewards:
settings.content:
• Workout 3 times a week, with each session above 30 minutes.
  • Check-in for at least 15 workout sessions over the 6 weeks to get a 20% refund. Post an exercise photo or video in the Facebook group each time.
  • The top 5 participants who share the most workouts will receive a full refund!

settings.liquid: Join the Forward Challenge today and start your summer fitness adventure! For any questions or further details, feel free to contact us at services@ativafit.com, on Instagram or join our Facebook group. Let’s get active together!
